data.name: FileInfoTextBox.Text
data.value:
FFmpeg Licensed under the GPL v3 Download source code: svn://svn.ffmpeg.org/ffmpeg/trunk Homepage: http://www.ffmpeg.org
MPlayer Licensed under the GPL v2 Download source code: svn://svn.mplayerhq.hu/mplayer/trunk Homepage: http://www.mplayerhq.hu
----------------------------------------------
Software included in FFmpeg
Libopencore AMR-NB, AMR-WB Licensed under the Apache 2 Download source code: http://sourceforge.net/projects/opencore-amr Homepage: http://opencore-amr.sourceforge.net
FAAC Licensed under the LGPL Download source code: http://www.audiocoding.com/downloads.html Homepage: http://www.audiocoding.com
LAME MP3 Encoder Licensed under the LGPL Download source code: http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=290 Homepage: http://lame.sourceforge.net
Ogg Licensed under the BSD license Download source code: http://www.xiph.org/downloads Homepage: http://www.xiph.org
Theora Licensed under the BSD license Download source code: http://www.xiph.org/downloads Homepage: http://www.theora.org
Vorbis Licensed under the BSD license Download source code: http://www.xiph.org/downloads Homepage: http://www.vorbis.com
Speex Licensed under the BSD license Download source code: http://www.xiph.org/downloads Homepage: http://www.speex.org
Libvpx Licensed under the BSD license Download source code: git://review.webmproject.org/libvpx.git Homepage: http://www.webmproject.org
X264 Licensed under the GPL Download source code: git://git.videolan.org/x264.git Download source code: ftp://ftp.videolan.org/pub/videolan/x264/snapshots Homepage: http://www.videolan.org/developers/x264.html
Xvid Licensed under the GPL Download source code: http://www.xvid.org Homepage: http://www.xvid.org
Pthreads Licensed under the LGPL Download source code: http://sourceware.org/pthreads-win32/#download Homepage: http://sourceware.org/pthreads-win32
Zlib Licensed under the zlib license Download source code: http://www.zlib.net Homepage: http://www.zlib.net
Bzip2 Licensed under the BSD license Download source code: http://www.bzip.org/downloads.html Homepage: http://www.bzip.org
NASM Licensed under the BSD license Download source code: http://www.nasm.us/pub/nasm/releasebuilds/2.09.02 Homepage: http://www.nasm.us
Yasm Licensed under the BSD license Download source code: http://www.tortall.net/projects/yasm/wiki/Download Homepage: http://www.tortall.net/projects/yasm/wiki
----------------------------------------------
Software
AviSynth Licensed under the GPL v2 Download source code: http://sourceforge.net/projects/avisynth2 Homepage: http://www.avisynth.org
FFmpegSource Licensed under the GPL v3 Download source code: http://code.google.com/p/ffmpegsource/downloads/list Homepage: http://code.google.com/p/ffmpegsource
DGMPGDec Licensed under the GPL v2 Download source code: http://neuron2.net/dgmpgdec/dgmpgdec.html Homepage: http://neuron2.net/dgmpgdec/dgmpgdec.html
VSFilter Licensed under the GPL Download source code: http://sourceforge.net/projects/guliverkli2 Homepage: http://sourceforge.net/projects/guliverkli2
Yadif Licensed under the GPL v2 Download source code: http://avisynth.org/mediawiki/Yadif Homepage: http://avisynth.org/mediawiki/Yadif
BeHappy - BassAudio, NicAudio Licensed under the GPL v2 Download source code: http://behappy.codeplex.com Homepage: http://behappy.codeplex.com
AvisynthWrapper Licensed under the GPL v2 Download source code: http://avisynthwrapper.codeplex.com Homepage: http://avisynthwrapper.codeplex.com
MediaInfo Licensed under the LGPL Download source code: http://mediainfo.sourceforge.net Homepage: http://mediainfo.sourceforge.net
----------------------------------------------
Nero AAC Download: http://www.nero.com/eng/downloads-nerodigital-nero-aac-codec.php Homepage: http://www.nero.com Nero AAC Binary(neroAacEnc.exe) is not included in the Kirara Encoder.
